step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with closed fists and drawing your arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles as you do this.
Excellent! You opened your fingers and extended your arms. Keep exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you move outwards.
Great continuation. Ensure your arms are extending horizontally to shoulder height and you are exhaling.
Good. Focus on maintaining the horizontal arm extension and a relaxed posture as you complete the movement.
Nice work completing the first repetition. Remember to fully open your fingers and relax your muscles.
Second rep starting well with closed fists. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles.
Good extension. Continue to exhale and relax your muscles as you open your hands and move arms out.
Keep up the good form. Ensure arms are at shoulder height and you are exhaling fully.
Nicely done. Focus on keeping the arms horizontal and the muscles relaxed as you finish the outward movement.
Excellent job completing both repetitions! You followed the instructions well, focusing on arm movements and muscle tension.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms moving horizontally to shoulder height and to fully open your fingers while exhaling and relaxing. This helps promote lymph drainage effectively.
